commands.name: az iot hub device-identity connection-string show
commands.summary: Show a given IoT Hub device connection string.
commands.syntax:
az iot hub device-identity connection-string show --device-id
                                                  [--auth-type {key, login}]
                                                  [--hub-name]
                                                  [--key-type {primary, secondary}]
                                                  [--login]
                                                  [--resource-group]
